text: Marietta Karamanli (Greek: Μαριέττα Καραμανλή, born December 18, 1964 in Athens) is French politician of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche who has been a member of the National Assembly of France since 2007. She represents the Sarthe department. ==Political career== In parliament, Karamanli serves on the Committee on Legal Affairs. In November 2018, she co- authored (with Éric Bothorel) a parliamentary report on digital taxation.Elsa Bembaron and Elisa Braun (1 April 2019), Les cinq dossiers chauds qui attendent Cédric O au Numérique Le Figaro. In addition to her role in parliament, Karamanli has been serving as member of the French delegation to the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe (PACE) since 2007. She is a member of the Committee on the Honouring of Obligations and Commitments by Member States of the Council of Europe (Monitoring Committee) and the Sub- Committee on External Relations. In this capacity, she has served as the Assembly's rapporteur on the access by detainees to a lawyer (2017)Member states should ensure that detainees have access to a lawyer Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe, press release of March 10, 2017. and on the protection provided to victims of terrorism (since 2019).For adequate protection and support for victims of terrorism Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe, press release of October 2, 2019. From 2014 until 2016, Karamanli served as General Rapporteur of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe on the Abolition of the Death Penalty.Death penalty: concern at the latest events in Belarus and Russia Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe, press release of March 20, 2015. In that role, she publicly condemned plans of the Russian State Duma to introduce capital punishment for certain crimes relating to terrorism in March 2015. ==Political positions== In July 2019, Karamanli voted against the French ratification of the European Union’s Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) with Canada.Maxime Vaudano (24 July 2019), CETA : qui a voté quoi parmi les députés Le Monde. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Greek emigrants to France Category:Politicians from Athens Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Marietta Karamanli
